response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its high quality and unique features, the product is valued at $10,000 by you. To ensure both parties benefit from this transaction, I propose to sell it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while allowing me to maintain a fair profit margin. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
